availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary Ann Bradford Beach (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, resident. Ohio native. Married to William Bradford. Mother of Amasy Bradford, Marcus Lafayette Bradford, Francis Bradford, Elizabeth Bradford, Mary A. Bradford, Mary J. Bradford, and Delitha A. Bradford. Married to John Beach. Mother of Edwin Beach. Resident of Covington, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p.233B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 570-1.
"Marry Ann Mullin Beach (1815-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #4992008, accessed July 1, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/4992008.
